summary: Two Redguard brothers, the adventurous sons of a wealthy Hammerfell family, are both well-trained in one-handed and blocking, and they are formidable allies in battle due to their custom combat style. The older brother, Thadimir, prefers prefers heavy armor, while Thazimir prefers light armor.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][b][u]Description[/u][/b][/size]

Two Redguard brothers, the adventurous sons of a wealthy Hammerfell family, have travelled to Skyrim for a chance to test their abilities. Both are well-trained in one-handed and blocking, and they are formidable allies in battle due to the custom combat style they learned under the high-paid tutelage of a master swordsman during their youth. The older brother, Thadimir, prefers prefers heavy armor, while Thazimir prefers light armor.

[b]They can be found relaxing at the Winking Skeever in Solitude.[/b]
Take along one or the other as a reliable follower...or bring along both if you use UFO!

[i]NOTE: The intent is for them to be highly capable - especially in modded games - but not overpowered. One-on-one against any enemy of comparable level, they should do quite well, but that is due to tactics.[/i]

[size=4][b][u]Features[/u][/b][/size]
[list]
[*]Both are flagged Essential.
[*]Level from 10 to 80.
[*]Both have Lightfoot perk (and numerous other combat-related perks).
[*]Custom class - they excel at one-handed weapons (sword, axe, and mace) and blocking.
[*]Custom combat style - they shield-bash and tank effectively.
[*]Both have a custom healing spell - gets them back into action quickly.
[*]They are dressed in fine clothes, so any armor you give them they should wear.
[*]All vanilla assets - no face or hair mods required.
[/list]

[size=4][b][u]Versions[/u][/b][/size]
See "Latest Version" link above.

[size=4][b][u]Installation[/u][/b][/size]
1) Download with NMM and activate.
(If you install manually rather than wth NMM, make sure the facegen data gets installed!)

[size=4][b][u]Removal[/u][/b][/size]
1)Deactivate in NMM.

[size=4][b][u]Recommended Mods[/u][/b][/size]
[list]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14037]UFO-Ultimate Follower Overhaul[/url]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11887/?]Stagger Fix[/url] (for Thadimir's Tower of Strength [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11887/?][/url][url=http://][/url]perk)

[/list]

[size=4][b][u]Other[/u][/b][/size]
The armors in the pics are from [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10277]Omegared99's Armor Compilation[/url]
Thadimir is wearing Mountain armor
Thazimir is wearing Thane armor
The swords in the pics are from [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1002]JaySuS Swords[/url]
Both are using the Fine Crusader sword


[size=4][b][u]My Mods[/u][/b][/size]
[list]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13198]Incremental Difficulty[/url] - Expert and Master Difficulty increase enemy damage output without decreasing the player damage output
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18552 ]Mages Focus[/url] - a magicka regen & spell cost reduction buff spell for battlemages
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13680]Quieter Dremora Summons[/url] - Dremora summons say their lines less frequently
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18960]Giants Are People Too[/url] - Giants can be just subdued rather than killed
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18885]Khajiit Campsite[/url] - A Khajiit tent player home near Whitewatch Tower
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19360]Thadimir and Thazimir - Redguard Followers[/url] - Two Redguard one-handed and shield tanks with custom combat styles
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19738 ]Niphriel - A Wood Elf Necro Ranger Follower[/url] - Bow, one-handed and the dark arts
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19888]Belrand Reloaded[/url] - A skills and cosmetic makeover of Belrand the hireling
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19903]Follower Trade Priority[/url] - Moves the "I need to trade some things with you" topic up in the list of dialogue choices
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49155/?]Orc Followers[/url] - Four Orc followers with various abilities ready for battle
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49293/?]Follower Keeva-Ja - Conjurer of Fire and Ice Wraiths[/url] - Argonian follower Keeva-Ja conjures fire and ice wraiths together, and also has spell tomes so you can learn to summon these creatures
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49501/?]Lore-Friendly Lydia[/url] - A young and capable Lydia remake which remains lore-friendly.
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49568/?]Resilient Follower Jewelry[/url] - Jewelry for followers to recover from bleedout better and faster
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52549/?]Jordis Empowered[/url] - A strong and attractive 2H-wielding Jordis
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52560]Adelaisa Vendicci Revised[/url] - Improve the appearance & skill of the vanilla follower Adelaisa
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52936]J'zargo the Magnificent[/url] - Makes J'zargo's skills worthy of his ego
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53157]Valdimar Improved[/url] - Improve the skills and appearance of Valdimar the housecarl
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71236/?]Uthgerd the Ally[/url] - Improve the appearance and skills of the follower Uthgerd, and bypass the brawl bugs
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71432?]Rayya Revised[/url] - Improve the appearance, outfit and skills of Falkreath housecarl Rayya
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71597/?]Annekke Revised[/url] - Improves the looks and skills of Annekke Crag-Jumper. Includes special Bounder Edition!
[/list]
author: LazyAltmer

files.name: Thadimir and Thazimir
files.changelogHtml: Updated the file to include facegen textures.
